entry.title: New release for Bigcapital: v0.18.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: sync the removed bank transactions from the source by @abouolia in https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/pull/527

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigcapitalhq/bigcapital/compare/v0.18.4...v0.18.5
